attributes.action: Restrict Bonfire Night firework displays to 5th November only or the nearest Saturday night.
attributes.additional_details:
Our dog has been terrified for the last 10 nights running due to Bonfire "Fortnight". She has been panting and shaking uncontrollably for up to 4 hours a night even after being given tranquilisers.

I would like to see a law passed restricting Bonfire Night firework displays to 5th November or the nearest Saturday only and only permitted at other times with a local authority licence at £100 per application.
